Title: The Dogs of Riga
Plot: After two Eastern European corpses are washed ashore on a raft in Ystad, Wallander travels to Latvia on the hunt for the killers. Thrown into a cold, alien world of police surveillance and lies, Wallander soon finds himself entangled in a web of corruption with no-one to trust.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
